chapters.title: Chapter 28: Crimsonthorn
chapters.info: Lady Shiaine Avarhin, p. 552 (629)—Darkfriend who previously worked for Jaichim Carridin and now commands her own circle of Darkfriends. She tried to kill Mat when she found him and Rand in a shed on their way from Emond's Field to Fal Dara. She gives orders to Daved Hanlon.
